title: ORZO WITH SPINACH AND ROASTED RED PEPPERS
directions: Cook orzo according to package directions omitting any oil.
When the orzo is cooked, drain and set aside.
In a small saucepan heat the olive oil over medium heat.
Add in the roasted red peppers and garlic.
Add the orzo, spinach, basil, salt, pepper, and balsamic vinegar into the saucepan and heat through.
Remove the saucepan from the heat and stir in the parmesan cheese.
ingredients: Freshly ground black pepper to taste
